docs.snippet: CAIRO, July 9 President Gamal Abdel Nasser of the United Arab Republic declared tonight that the nuclear arms race and the "pressures of overpopulation" were the principal dangers confronting the world.
docs.lead_paragraph: CAIRO, July 9 President Gamal Abdel Nasser of the United Arab Republic declared tonight that the nuclear arms race and the "pressures of overpopulation" were the principal dangers confronting the world.
docs.abstract: Pres Nasser calls pressure of overpopulation 1 of principal world dangers

headline.main: NASSER CONDEMNS ATOM ARMS RACE; At Neutrals' Parley He Also Decries Population Surge

byline.original: By JAY WALZ Special to The New York Times

headline.main: SHIPPING MAILS; ALL HOURS GIVEN IN DAYLIGHT SAVING TIME

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, July 11 The Argentine Government has warned the Metalworkers Union that it will act harshly against any attempt to occupy metalworking factories that have laid off about 50,000 workers.
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, July 11 The Argentine Government has warned the Metalworkers Union that it will act harshly against any attempt to occupy metalworking factories that have laid off about 50,000 workers.
docs.abstract: Govt warns Metalworkers Union under Peronists against occupying plants to protest layoffs; talks with plant owners broken off

headline.main: ARGENTINA WARNS PERONISTS' UNION; Bids Metalworkers Discard Plan to Seize Factories

byline.original: By EDWARD C. BURKS Special to The New York Times

docs.snippet: BRUSSELS, Belgium, July 15 (Reuters)--Dr. Jose A. Mora Otero of Uruguay, Secretary General of the Organisation of American States, arrived in Brussels today in the first stage of a European trip aimed at strenthening relations between Latin America...
docs.lead_paragraph: BRUSSELS, Belgium, July 15 (Reuters)--Dr. Jose A. Mora Otero of Uruguay, Secretary General of the Organisation of American States, arrived in Brussels today in the first stage of a European trip aimed at strenthening relations between Latin America and the European Economic Community.
